summary: The diff adds a new /game route, navigation entry points (Header + HomePage), and implements a browser-based match-3 game page with an 8x8 board and 6 tile types. However, required generated image assets are not evidenced as added, touch interactions are not evidenced beyond click, and HUD elements (score/restart/instructions) are not fully verifiable due to truncation. The diff also includes broad global theme token changes that were not explicitly requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add static image assets for the match-3 game under frontend/public/assets/generated (6 tile PNGs + background) and use them in the game UI.
missing_requirements.reason: GamePage references the required asset paths, but the diff summary shows no added files under frontend/public/assets/generated, so the required generated images are not evidenced as being added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Players can swap only adjacent tiles using mouse and touch interactions.
missing_requirements.reason: GamePage shows only onClick-based selection/swapping; no touch-specific handlers (e.g., onTouchStart/onTouchMove) are evidenced in the shown diff content.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add HUD and controls: show current score, a restart/new game control, and a visible English instruction block.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided portion of GamePage shows the title/description and board rendering, but the side panel (where HUD/controls likely live) is truncated, so score display, restart control, and instructions are not verifiable from the diff summary alone.

hallucinated_features.description: Broad global theme token/color system changes in frontend/src/index.css beyond game-specific styling.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-14 asks for a bright stone-themed visual style for the game screen, but the diff changes many global CSS variables (background/foreground/primary/etc.) affecting the entire app, which is not explicitly requested as part of adding the game.
